name: After Earth (itch) (thunnings)
description:
Short simulation of deep-space travel over long periods of time. Underlying systems for different crew types, each having different birth and death rates allowing for a randomized journey.

Future improvements would allow for randomized destinations, initial crew setup by the player, unique events that are handled differently based on the type of crew on board, resource gathering at destination systems and ship upgrades along a technology tree.
